institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-led youth customized training project operation rules/Article 1 (Purpose)
contents: Article 1 (Purpose) This rule applies to Korean industries in accordance with Article 145, Paragraph 3, Item 13 of the Enforcement Decree of the Employment Insurance Act, Article 52, Paragraph 2, Item 4 of the Enforcement Decree of the Worker Vocational Competency Development Act, and the National Human Resources Development Consortium Operation Regulations. The purpose is to stipulate the matters necessary to implement industry-led youth customized training projects entrusted to the Human Resources Development Service.
